name: openclaw-memvid-logger
description: Dual-output conversation logger with full context capture. Stores to JSONL (backup) and Memvid (semantic search) for long-term memory
author: stackBlock

JSONL_LOG_PATH.description: Path to JSONL backup log file (default: ~/.openclaw/workspace/conversation_log.jsonl)

MEMVID_BIN.description: Path to memvid CLI binary (auto-detected if not set)

credentials.name: MEMVID_API_KEY
credentials.description: Memvid API key for cloud/paid tier access. NOT REQUIRED for free local mode. Only needed if using API mode with remote storage.

permissions.name: file_write
permissions.reason: Write conversation logs to JSONL files and create Memvid .mv2 memory files in user's workspace

permissions.name: exec_subprocess
permissions.reason: Call memvid CLI to append frames to memory files

warnings.message: This skill captures ALL OpenClaw activity including user messages, assistant responses, sub-agent conversations, tool outputs, and system events. Data is stored locally by default (JSONL + .mv2 files). API mode requires explicit MEMVID_API_KEY and sends data to memvid.com cloud service.
Logs persist until manually deleted. Consider log rotation and file permissions for sensitive data.
